snippet: Slap Shot will provide live analysis of the Winter Classic between the Rangers and the Flyers, beginning at 3 p.m. Monday.
abstract: Slap Shot will provide live analysis of the Winter Classic between the Rangers and the Flyers, beginning at 3 p.m. Monday.
lead_paragraph: Slap Shot will provide live analysis of the Winter Classic game between the Rangers and the Flyers, beginning at 3 p.m. Monday. On Sunday, the N.H.L. moved the game's start time from 1 to 3 p.m. in the hope of improving ice conditions. NBC's coverage will still start at 1 p.m., the same time the gates open at Citizens Bank Park.

headline.main: Live Coverage of Winter Classic on Monday
